#  Lisette Carrithers
### Content and Web Development

##RELEVANT EXPERIENCE

_Owner_ 
justpublishyourself.com  |  Chicago IL  |  2011 – Present
Provides publishing education and services to self-published authors. Wordpress website development services for authors. 
Live training classes through UW-Madison. Formatting for Print and Electronic books. Social Media/ reader outreach planning for authors.

_Self Published Author as L.C. Giroux_ 
lcgiroux.com |  Chicago IL  |  2011 – Present
16 books published in multiple formats across all major vendors, including print. 2 books reached Amazon top 100 in the Contemporary Romance Genre. Reader outreach through social media. Develop collaborations with other authors to further L.C. Giroux brand.

_Publisher & Editor_
sewnmagazine.com | New Haven CT| 2006-2011
Online fashion sewing magazine, #2 on organic Google searches for fashion sewing. Coordinating remote editing and writing staff. Website development. Soliciting advertising. 


_Lab Manager_
Yale School of Medicine/ UW School of Medicine/ UI-C College of Medicine| 
New Haven CT/ Madison WI/ Chicago | 2002-2012 2015-Present
Technical Writing, Safety and Work Protocols, Budgeting, Ordering, Securing quotes from vendors, Grant preparation, Grant submissions to federal agencies, Training of students, Day to day maintenance, Molecular biology assays

_Data Manager_
Yale Cancer Center | New Haven CT | 2001-2002

##EDUCATION

Yale University
Bachelor of Arts in Architecture/ Urban Studies

Brainbench.com

2953649
